title: How To Break A Curse
alternative_title: How to Solve the Curse, 解除詛咒的方法, 저주를 푸는 방법
status: How to Solve the Curse, 解除詛咒的方法, 저주를 푸는 방법
description:
Description :
        Hela is cursed to lose her magic if she doesn't engage in a sexual relationship. As she feels her magical powers gradually wane, she decides to move to a quiet village.
